name: Necrotech Reaver
description: The Necrotech Reaver is a Huge undead creature with a powerful physique and a menacing presence, wielding four chains as weapons.
memorable: Notable for its ability to double damage to structures and its unique chain weapon attacks.
goals: To engage in combat and destroy fortified structures.
relations: Related to other undead creatures; may serve as a guardian or enforcer.
environment: Typically found in battlefields or ruins, where it can wreak havoc.
strengths: Significant melee damage output and ability to grapple multiple foes.
weaknesses: Has disadvantage on saving throws against being knocked prone.
attacks: Utilizes two Chain Lash attacks dealing substantial slashing damage and grappling enemies.
most_powerful_ability: The Bladed Sweep, which can hit multiple targets and knock them prone.
skills: Has a low passive perception of 9.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its undead nature.
Can deal damage to structures at double the normal rate as a Siege Monster.
Sluggish due to low Dexterity score.
Can grapples targets with its chain attacks.
test_queries: brutal melee undead that grapples foes
menacing creature that swings chains in battle
